titles.title: Harbor Light Monogatari: Fashion Lala yori
Harbour Light Story: Fashion Lala yori
ハーバーライト物語 ファッションララより
Fashion Lala: The Story of the Harbour Light

data.title: Harbor Light Monogatari: Fashion Lala yori
data.title_english: Fashion Lala: The Story of the Harbour Light
data.title_japanese: ハーバーライト物語 ファッションララより
title_synonyms: Harbour Light Story: Fashion Lala yori
data.synopsis: A Cinderella story of sorts, Fashion Lala stars a little girl named Miho who doesn't get along with her family. Miho loves to design clothing, but her aunt and three cousins don't believe that such a young girl is capable and mock her designs. Meanwhile, a contest for the new "Disco Queen" is coming up, and Miho wants nothing more than to be able to design a dress for someone to wear to the competition, since she's too young to enter herself. With determination and a little bit of magic, Miho's dreams just might come true!
